medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began one week ago with loose stools and a two-day history of fever up to 101.8°F, which recurred with chills and abdominal pain that shifted from epigastric to lower abdomen. He did not eat on the day of admission due to feeling unwell. In the ED, he had a temperature of 104.6°F.
medical_history.past_medical_history: DM2, HTN, CAD s/p CABG, CHF, afib, Amio induced toxicity (pulmonary toxicity and corneal deposits), Depression, Hypothyroidism, OSA, Spinal stenosis s/p L3/L4 laminectomy, Ventral hernia s/p repair.
